tweet: Oh I *was* absolutely Austrian when I got into bitcoin.

All I keep hearing is that Bitcoin Cash is an infested cesspool of lawless, leaderless, disrespectful, narcissistic, greedy, scammy, capitalistic anarchists that will never create digital money! I swear I’m getting dejavu!
How is my performance leading Litecoin adoption and development?
I don't bash Bitcoin, only Bcash.
It's a tie between Bitcoin Core and Lightning Network Coin

I retract my statement calling the lawsuit stupid. I just found out that Roger has changed the website back to listing bcash as "Bitcoin Cash (BCH)" instead of just Bitcoin. So for that, the lawsuit has already done some good. So carry on!
Oh, you are right! They added back Bitcoin Cash (BCH)
The downside is that it will backfire in the future when the court takes down http://bitcoin.org  because they changed their mind and decided that Bcash is Bitcoin.
Same. That's why I'm not suing Litecoin Cash or any other Litecoin forks trying to confuse people. Educate instead.
A comment on a Bitcoin lawsuit will hurt Litecoin? Come on, you trolls can do better than this!
Is http://bitcoin.com  selling BCH as BTC? Where?

Although I think it's wrong for people to claim that Bitcoin Cash is Bitcoin or for Roger and http://bitcoin.com  to mislead users with stuff like "Bitcoin (BCH)" and "Bitcoin Core", I do not think it's anything illegal. So this lawsuit is stupid IMO.http://bitcoinist.com/bitcoin-lawsuit-bitcoin-com-ceo-roger-ver/ …
